Reviews.Title: not worth 170
Reviews.Author: ram
Reviews.Content: It was nice that it came with accecories..but its still wasn't worth 170 the phone was really beat up n its falling apart from the sides.. not so happy

Reviews.Title: EVO 3D
Reviews.Author: Dy
Reviews.Content: This phone looks new ..I.have an ipnone 5 . I needed something to use on WIMAX (sprints 4.g). Until the LTE was finished ,so far not one complaint ..thank you

Reviews.Title: EVO 3D
Reviews.Author: Jamal
Reviews.Content: The phone is Okay. So far the charger doesnt charge the phone any more. I dont know why because the phone is brand new.
